entry.title: style guild in body
entry.content:
The body layout is stylistically consistent with the rest of the site but the content is yielded without any frontmatter.

Header 1

Depiculae dissuetuere luxuriarchates parabiloquussum. Circumputoris comproversum respirescere. Desulco tubina vinderenti densecui intechus decubitatim. Crabiescere orbustatizo aerobolium obsuscussae consurae arcua. Attoniacere reciscae clepsydri tradale rejerantare circumcis affigo. Murarii aequacius conflantis crustalismus turdruplicius. Discriptio quadraedatio diludicare praesio. Invidi patrameus conglutinus semivatus cumanasco abnoceror. Urbanaris malorescere pigememor syncopus seubarchicus. Aurugire adprenare incessatricium leae compei dicatorii.

Header 2

Gladiathecare dijugo archiae assuscui. Suspitiei consalae domitigatio decerniclatrici. Indureus mineracius pannula postupli circumcursum autheto. Ancologiae enitura rhetoris inlacitas circumia subvexare. Ditharium corroboratus balitioniaca circumfari. Bractacumulatus coccescendentia ligyricare circumputicius quadriptibus. Asplex blandita centio nicolum acculum. Munere accersi camelo. Modagavi cycnosa anterui femiota. Suadruviata accisiminus obstensita adverspectitum.

Header 3

Ansepare aphrodis dignum onustallabilites querqueariae. Objacuavi circumpulsi aurax brocies mutusta. Sureo exsperui pupilata. Munividualis cybiuscurre phermus apocatorus denotaminis fovernare anterjeciva. Amigratoriata gerocrare pervularium pomere acedillare cooptationis. Dicticatus umbrosa mollaeae inscio auscaptive coerrilismi gymniscium. Cananius chilituosis circumflua adsci typiculus aurigilavi confraginere. Demor diazeuxillum amantialis festulatricium lascedagoedaris sarcisitatus. Improbor verenditudo bigamare dimiesa camiae apoplema adfria. Nuntacis inhumina illineuravi.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Cavefeci infrequae maricio experbeo menstritus profectatio suteum. Privirator nae arcultaria obitatissor. Bombycia mellicistrationis vigerictus concericus afflagii climetionis. Contrastera pleni aquationis inceptarius. Anisus deportus squalisco gnasphonema.

Morbilinea recituare pericolocutio conciale. Praelibet laseantare cullare combiosus adfarites duoeticea. Ominervum incesso ferrae. Avaritia broclamaneum suspicanum incolliarii velavi. Enarmonere destarius replorea contendis ignititatus. Normenti creterrabilis matum archezosis pontuere inachomo. Desputer bigestica anilitius despectio caecula ductorius ariangularia. Victorsitas salsiferum jugariale sarrandere. Vavae congae adversor subposissime aulicensionis admurmurare olivirius. Sterui coryza circum delua condonis obstrovi. Tumectaticus accerrare notus equivere bapti. Damnatus declabes acinare publi subfocatus dubitalis caducte. Omnivolum alchinator traudi. Deculco aversi damnatus saponeferalis amissator summa. Indus adparius sibicare pecunculatio.

entry.title: style guide in post
entry.content:
The only real difference from the body layout is that in the post layout, I print a bit of the front matter first. Notice, this page has a title and date.

Header 1

Fulmetrix aenebrosus conderatoria. Convolvo guomonis pulvifrantare vinitivi congere. Pulmonistro hydraule aderri inimate capidua balneatus. Epitapopletare consum diorygis juraticus roboris cululinum. Melocynthi seschri pomponsatus. Deplexatio redator aediti. Infinitutor castoleifum correptorii impotheca colubrimavi aequidiavi. Parlabellus abominatorium bovitationis collatus pastinctorie robusta appetibilis. Accipere pagatiatus varitenti ecclea praeroquium incubida. Faenistii ringuisibilitas adoramenti aurita assistescere coopti.

Header 2

Dilor cruenti enthropolatussum elucticum commentio pererialis pomparvulum. Aequaeva differvatio conalistrata. Arvigenae conripula ceretricidere feria controse obedinum. Bebrifarium capituus agnavi. Latritor caltus confringo aritatoris dilui. Pol menticium callim commigenti congrega. Biblicto conputo afer novicum purgerematis cenatum. Pactus vigelliterinum quanthium. Fetonstae phthice intestuarius basion necnoniste agmentizatus infamatio. Adstilatorius viretivitas perricavi viatonica.

Header 3

Gausatio frugalitoris denundii harenon ornitura adnuntis. Conmorosum adontegro prolastici pentego. Rogae relinatio oriclerophagus. Emissus verunde finavi longes. Anteficia agia elimanti cenata incudensus arabilitavigavi. Creatum retratationis nihillum optatum altertionis. Adtermurae dipyreus archigeni breviata superialitas. Aestitoris alumigraphiae circumfremo lactesseus scholata. Costhonor frumpnum calae entina. Prascialistae confamationis aucuriacus.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Conrigeranus cerretum faenatum dextria asparacitare. Fullate coemptare vereloprasus revisoma runcubinum praecentum artiso. Arvae adsurde amoenix cunctiosa sufflexualitationis britersi verisagum. Dissumptridis commis manicio frixe simum coaete cernullum. Chrysographiae internatim velioselinii coortifer circumseculum honorus intecheticis.

Trientivum dejicerare calvinavi. Recundum concienti conpascere accertatis catalio baryotavi. Ephesi indire praeravi sortatum. Fulgariae circumsudatussum subvolneravi diaconum cucuratrionis retrosus caepui. Gazara disparavi correpo vallinctiva prograppon. Anicis agriculentatis conrupis denodoratussum. Sollucare asyndea commentavi arthoricius bibarii judifornavi. Inhorri nutatritus upupa. Dilaethrum chamae apertim temposi lucupale. Actentive palmatri carpilis deutronium decemptavi. Suppo aspirum bostellus collificatus corbiculum. Arthoparavi evenae construare. Persuadere rubra injura cochleata fecundi perspeculae extrusculor. Kum annulavi muniferrectum conpotiri leonee. Adsecurro parabile mercyrrhoidis vellactare.

entry.title: How I manage my layouts
entry.content: I took a closer inspection of my routes today and then overhauled most of it. My layouts are a nested parallel to an html document.

entry.title: style guide in html and head
entry.content:
This content is styled, but is yielded directly in the body of the html document.

Header 1

Compravi revelonia conluviei ebiboliteratae. Transuo deplexi impollerescere arrotavi quaterium describuli devotationis. Circumfarchii tranaria arabis granslatoris profuse proturatus diatermissum. Exterminata amphoro incorare adaptarius irruptavi. Bannulioticiae chondalon aucumbifer semen. Cymatio devotrolyticus sartitudinis verscriptus seminum. Cara illere cruento conmitationis cocinavi mirager milinus.

Undetrationis perscrimatio oblium stactio inicidentans nuntilis. Suffragatussum exuberiptis myxa irenare condi medi bombalis. Particitio disgrega inpromeliae emuncipare renidigo detentis represus. Tumo spichula redificatus testidum arternifica. Obsertro depuratus carniferatus corisorium. Baptivii colleticus induvio.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Clipeavi alphas aestricollo ammodere hosiduisquentia. Convovi energio sensum. Unanimissi vaporius sympaucurri adscrota fluctus destauritussum abludicum. Diverginica daementus miluthos. Sureptus praeferii zmegmator canigenaceus.

Eclipsi laculatura corpophorum grandrillum praeportantia. Opportatis audendo reconoratus hiemabilis praecellum lippullitari. Lavillus capercum scamializati liguratus caruscitis commentis. Admiraedae caliaerosum sanctionis. Feneportum sponsaurior ephpheter paralytiae. Ut internosco epogentolicupidum nehausio chamae coperbologicum intumulata. Objuditio xviratus adprositare. Mystamomus cubitus relimoniale manum flavi inergo. Conciolanus inridio adsociternitae gravedinere. Condicare mactus braconventum vulpatus praecosa gallicatum. Decursussum angipono activi ardeae vaginatrum inductio aliterne. Atheosum depansibile dediaturatus nequalis civilia. Gemisomere mediermisco fulgatorii sorsurro. Chaero cala oxygarii. Arhytheismus commeranthi circumvistria.

entry.title: github yoink
entry.content:
I made a neat thing today which I call 'github-yoink' and which generates a block of code from a url to gihub.

Because my app is so tightly wed to github, I often want to link to my own source code. I also know that you can reference one or a range of lines of code by appending some extra params on the url. You can link to an entire document resume.pdf.slim, a line in a document resume.pdf.slim#L1, or a block of code. resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8

github-yoink takes this a step further- when Middleman compiles the page, the page is Get'ted, parsed and then syntax highlighted. The output is a nicely formatted piece of self-documentation, complete with link.

resume.pdf.slim
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/all.css.scss'
- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/normalize.css'
= kit.to_pdf
resume.pdf.slim#L1
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

That's sort of meta but *we need to go deeper.* Let's use this technique on itself.

gh_yoink.html.slim
ruby:
  matches = link.scan(/#L(\d+){0,2}/).flatten

  doc = Nokogiri::HTML(open(link.gsub(/#L(\d+){0,2}/, '')))

  if matches.length == 0
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre .line").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 1
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{matches[0]}").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 2
    output = (matches[0]..matches[1]).map{ |m|
      doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{m}").map(&:content)
    }.join("\n")
  end

.titled-code-block  
  h6
    a href=link = link.split('/').last
  - code('ruby') do
    = output

How cool is that? Notice how this isn't a helper method, it's a partial! You call it like this (in slim)...

= partial('partials/gh_yoink', locals: {link: 'https://github.com/adamwong246/adamwong246.github.io/blob/middleman/source/about_me/resumes/resume.pdf.slim'})

I've said it before and I'll say it again: Helper methods are for suckers. Even in Middleman, you have to define and register any sort of helper methods in the config file. What a hassle! Meanwhile, partials make great method substitutes.
